articles.description: Princess Eugenie and her husband Jack Brooksbank headed on a festive night out for drinks in London amid the fallout surrounding Meghan and Harry's Netflix documentary
articles.content:
Princess Eugenie and her husband Jack Brooksbank headed out for some festive drinks as they continue to remain neutral in the ongoing 'feud' between her cousins Prince William and Prince Harry.

articles.title: This forgotten Monopoly rule dramatically alters the game - Daily Mail
articles.description: Fan of the game Ruben, from Los Angeles, took to his Twitter with the revelation back in 2017 and it quickly went viral, and it has resurfaced again today after a British podcaster tweeted.
articles.content:
